title: Diff. eq.: No context, from slope equation part - b

content.description: Let f be a function with f(1) = 4 such that for all points (x, y) on the graph of f the slope is given by 3x2+1 / 2y .
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 1 and use it to approximate f(1.2).

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 1 and use it to approximate f(1.2).

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
